Hi Adi,
I hope you are well.

We have a test build that fixes the issue.

Next steps will be communicated as soon as product team makes a decision around delivering the fix.

The test build can be downloaded using the following link:
https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_agent/Epp23122024/EppClient_v6.2.4.2000.zip

Regards,
Cristi
